boardgame.name: Space Hulk (second edition)
boardgame.description: Space Hulk is a game of tactical combat between Imperial Space Marines and alien creatures known as Genestealers. The combat takes place on derelict, alien infested space vessels know as space hulks._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Combat is action point driven and resolved through the use of dice. The marines have a finite number of figures to use in combat against endless hoards of Genestealers. The object is to accomplish given missions within their parameters or die trying._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There were significant differences between the 1st edition and this one. The first being that this version or revision was by Dean Bass and Chris Colston and based on the original game by Richard Halliwell and Paul Murphy. The most significant difference in this version was the removal of the sand timer and thus the requirement for the marines to accomplish their turn in a limited real-time period. Also the rules of the 2nd edition did not allow the player of the Space Marines to perform actions by using command points in the turn of the Genestealer player. Another change was the addition of combat specific dice to resolve weapons fire and a special die to resolve gun jams. A few other minor changes were made to the rules and board graphics as well._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This version contains the initial six missions found in the first edition and adds an additional 12 missions which were different than those in the 1st edition of the Deathwing and Genestealer expansions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Digitally redeveloped into Alien Assault_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #6: Space Hulk and New Year_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Resolutions

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Space Hulk 2nd edition, by Games Workshop, 1996. Winner of the Origins Award for Best Fantasy/Science Fiction board game of 1989. Rare. Contents nearly new, clean, complete _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; undamaged, with 2 bonus items. The 10 Terminator figures are snapped together, but are not glued or painted. Decals and banners are still on their original cards and ready for application. There are a total of 6 assembled Genestealer figures and 20 un-assembled. None are painted. The counters and room tiles look like they were just punched out and are in mint condition. Bonus: 2nd edition campaign from an issue of White Dwarf in the late _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;90s titled _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Defilement of Honor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; along with the 5 special air duct tiles the campaign requires. Bonus: an unofficial copy of the Space Hulk Bible (a collection of rules including house rules for other _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;races_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;). The box is not sturdy and there is some dishing of the box with some bent sides.

excellent shape including the box, content is as new ! Most figurines had first layer of paint in proper color (white for gene, blue and red for marines squads). French version, english rules also provided FREE SHIPPING TO EUROPE AND NORTH AMERICA !!! PLEASE READ DESCRIPTION CAREFULLY--INCOMPLETE GAME. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;v listed as GOOD because the contents that there , I believe,are in GOOD to AS NEW condition. Contents: - 1 Rulebook (crip as new condition) - 1 Mission book (crisp as new condition) - 1 Box Top (some kind of light covering,white discolour,possibly spray over a part of it !) - 1 Box Bottom box in good formed condition ,no broken corners, but edges scuffed. MODELS: NONE - NO Space Marine Terminator models ! - NO Genestealer models ! - NO Slottabases BOARD SECTIONS: all punched but in very very good condition. - 6 Rooms - 20 Corridors - 4 Space Marine Entry Areas - 6 Corner Sections - 8 T-junctions - 4 Dead-ends - 6 Crossroads - 20 Doors and 4 Bulkheads - 24 Plastic stands for doors (unpunched) COUNTERS:--ALL UNPUNCHED in their sheets. - 24 assorted Blip counters - 3 Malfunction Blip counters - 24 Flamer markers - 2 Flamer Reload markers - 8 Overwatch/Jam counters - 1 Command Points counter - 1 Turn counter - 2 Toxin Canister counters - 1 Hulk Archive counter - 1 Damping Controls counter - 1 Computer Console counter - 1 Airpump System counter - 1 C.A.T. counter - 1 control Panel board DICE: THERE ARE NO DICE... - NO Special Shooting dice - NO Special Jam die - ZERO 6-sided dice (1 red, 3 blue) Tried to describe as accurately as I can. Can supply pics upon request. UK postage £10.00 ordinary. UK postage £12.50 recorded. Europe £14.50 Airmail Europe £19.50 International signed and tracked. Email for international quotes please
